summary: AN ORDINANCE transferring from the Civil Service Department to the Department of Licenses and Consumer Affairs the responsibility for examining applicants for licenses as refrigeration mechanics and engineers; fumigators and exterminators, meat cutters and wrapper salesman; steam engineers and boiler fireman; and amending Ordinances 84297, 73223, 85744, 102625, 94465, 95906, 102638, 94465, 94567, 95906, 96110, 102638 and 94595 accordingly.
